reviews.review: The first 2/3rds of the movie was very entertaining despite numerous plot holes and issues in continuity. Where the story lost me was in the very start of the final act. The ending ruined many facets of the fandom with the marvel universe and makes most of the upcoming marvel movies not interesting.
Did not appreciate the way they expressed Thanos's character.
I'll just describe it as "The best movie of marvel  I have ever seen...". Every single scene gives me goosebumps every actions scenes thrilled me....

Amazing. Rollercoaster of emotions, got to see great new character interactions. One of the first marvel movies where the villain wins. Unexpectedly plot twists. all the events fall together nicely into a cohesive whole, yet unfinished, story.

The end of a story should be "unexpected, yet inevitable," as Aristotle said. Avengers 3 delivers a gripping build-up to just such an ending, with every major character (from the multitude of major characters) delivering at least one sincere laugh.

Very disappointing there was no plotline unless planet hopping and looking for pebbles  is classed as a plotline and then you get a purple hulk who got an A* in geology. Then you get the incredible hulk with hulk constipation. Now we really know why it is called infinity war because it seems like an infinity from start to finish. The movie did have a positive which is its fabulous comic lines and scenes.
But the short description is a infinye geology movie about a purple hulk but it deserves a star for the comedy
With the desire to create a cliff hanger they left this movie short on understandable plot to the non-comic reader. They also needed to employ an editor.
One of the greatest movies i have ever seen

Great movie with a fantastic villain, the best Marvel villain ever. Its the best Marvel movie I have seen. Its still not better than the Dark Knight but that its a league on its own but better than al others DC movies and more fun.
Great merging of the MCU!  Can't wait to see what happens next!
